entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 9:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
